Class.Name: Actor
Class.Description: Impmenentation of a controller class for all sumulation objectsRunnerThread

Function.Name: update
Function.Description: Update the simulant controlled by the actor

Function.Name: get_position
Function.Description: Returns the position vector of the simulant

Function.Name: get_velocity
Function.Description: Returns the velocity vector of the simulant

Function.Name: get_acceleration
Function.Description: Returns the velocity vector of the simulant

Function.Name: motion
Function.Description: Returns the motion behavior of the actor

Function.Name: create_behavior
Function.Description: Creates a behavior from a configuration
